Resistance.help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic
Resistance.targetHelp: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic

Fire_Ball.help: You are on fire, and are taking Damage over Time from the Fireball.
Fire_Ball.targetHelp: You are on fire, and are taking Damage over Time from the Fireball.

Stalagmites.help: The Rikti Magus has left you Disoriented with his Stalagmite attack. Your Defense is lowered.
Stalagmites.targetHelp: The Rikti Magus has left you Disoriented with his Stalagmite attack. Your Defense is lowered.

Lightning_Bolt.help: The Caster can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.targetHelp: The Caster can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Block_of_Ice.help: You are Held in a Block of Ice. You will be slowed from the cold when you break free.
Block_of_Ice.targetHelp: You are Held in a Block of Ice. You will be slowed from the cold when you break free.

Mass_Hypnosis.help: Rikti Magus has put you to sleep.
Mass_Hypnosis.targetHelp: Rikti Magus has put you to sleep.
